<h3 class="no-anchor" style="text-align: center;">

How to Cite EcoCommons

</h3>

<p style="text-align: center;">

If you use EcoCommons in your research, please cite the platform as follows:

</p>

<blockquote style="text-align: center;">

EcoCommons Australia 2025. <em>EcoCommons Australia – a collaborative commons for ecological and environmental modelling</em>, Queensland Cyber Infrastructure Foundation, Brisbane, Queensland. Available at: <a href="https://data–explorer.app.ecocommons.org.au/">https://data–explorer.app.ecocommons.org.au/</a> (Accessed: MM DD, YYYY). <a href="https://doi.org/10.3565/chbq-mr75">https://doi.org/10.3565/chbq-mr75</a>

</blockquote>

<p style="text-align: center;">

You can download the citation file for EcoCommons Australia here: <a href="reference.bib">Download the BibTeX file</a>
